title: Implementing ASP.NET Core UIs
itunes:author: Telerik
itunes:summary: On this episode of Eat Sleep Code, Scott Addie discusses the various options for creating UI components in ASP.NET Core.  Scott talks about TagHelpers, View Components, and if Razor is still used in the ASP.NET Core.

description: On this episode of Eat Sleep Code, Scott Addie discusses the various options for creating UI components in ASP.NET Core. Scott talks about TagHelpers, View Components, and if Razor is still used in the ASP.NET Core.
author: ed.charbeneau@telerik.com (Telerik)
